name: Free Countdown Timer Backup File
summary: File created by Free Countdown Timer, a program used for setting countdowns for birthdays, anniversaries, the new year, and other events; saves a backup of the countdown list and can be used for restoring countdowns or sharing countdowns with other Free Countdown Timer users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Comfort Software Group Free Countdown Timer
